Introduction¶

Equations are:

\[\begin{split}\frac{dS}{dt} &= -\beta S I \\ \frac{dI}{dt} &= \beta S I - \gamma I\end{split}\]

And refer to a paper [author2015].

[author2015]first a., second a., third a. (2015). The title of their paper. Journal of papers, 15: 1023-1049.

To start do the following

import model as m
import numpy as np

p = m.parameter_set()
x0 = np.array([0.99,0.01])
T = 20
ts,result = m.simulate(p,x0,T=T,dt=0.01)
